item.title: 'Like a sci-fi movie': US baby born from 30-year-old frozen embryo breaks record
item.description: It is believed to be longest that an embryo has been frozen before resulting in a successful live birth.

item.title: Swedish jihadist jailed for life over IS murder of Jordanian pilot in Syria
item.description: The killing of Lt Moaz al-Kasasbeh by the Islamic State group was shown in a grim video circulated online in 2015.

item.title: Russian strikes kill eight and hit Kyiv apartment block, officials say
item.description: A boy and his mother are among the dead and Kyiv says it has seen the biggest number of child casualties of the war.

item.title: More than 30 killed in nursing home hit by Beijing floods
item.description: Local officials admit "loopholes in emergency planning" and say the incident is a painful lesson that serves as "a wake-up call".

item.title: Watch: Huge stick insect discovered in Australia
item.description: A new "supersized" species of stick insect that is roughly as heavy as a golf ball has been discovered in Australia.
